subject: Re: Even the guys say....
author: Misty
full_text:
I tend to be more surprised when they hear it exactly as I do. Often 
its not on the "clearer" ones that I think everyone will hear. 
Sometimes we upload the clearest files and others dont hear it. That 
can be for a number of reasons. Perception and equipment being used 
for playback as well as individual hearing differs, etcetera. I know 
when I listen to my own files on different speakers or headphones the 
sound quality differs. It's just clearer on some than others.

Misty


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
